title: Should I get the iPhone XR or the iPhone 11? There's a 10 dollar difference. - Quora

response.answer_text: If there is a 10 dollar difference, get the iPhone 11. That phone came out in 2019 compared to the iPhone XR from 2018. The real question is if both of those phones have the same amount of storage or not. I’d go for the XR if the amount of storage is significantly more than the 11.

iPhone 11 no doubt! It's their straight flagship and not like the XR! Also since it's a 20$ difference you need to check other specifications like storage! The better storage, better the phone! I'll choose XR with more storage than a beefy new iPhone with comparatively less storage!
